overview: Jayden and her husband are having some marriage trouble. Dr. Marie shows them how to revive the flame by fucking the shit out of both of them. Priya’s husband has a bad back and can’t fuck her. Unable to take it anymore, she calls Keiran to come over and fuck her long and hard. Fernando admits his love for Maria. A story of passion and betrayal. Next Monday on Brazzersvision. Monique’s husband spends all his time ordering her around, so when the pizza he orders arrives it is time to get even. Monique takes the delivery boy into her room for a special payment. Ahryan and Tanya are dining with their husbands when the girls decide it is time to swap husbands. The guys don’t mind because the girls are hot and horny and ready to fuck.
title: Real Wife Stories 7
